jd: From: Danish Mujeeb, Han Staffing danish@hanstaffing.com Reply to: danish@hanstaffing.com Job Title: Business Analyst (Banking and Payments Domain)Location: Jersey City, NJ (Day 1 Onsite)Duration: Long Term ContractJob Description:Expertise in Banking and Payments domainProvide support as a project team member as needed.Act as liaison with internal and external partners.Contribute to preparation and review of test procedures and reports.Contribute to the development of a strategic customer roadmapEstablish and document processes to support all areas of responsibility.Create adhoc reports, data queries standard reports, and dashboards to support business needs.Maintain high quality project and software design documentation and analysis.Strong analytical, problem solving, communication and presentation skillsWorking in conjunction with product, operations, and development teams to ensure that applications meetrequirements and are of high quality Review Business Requirements and document the functional requirements. Create Interface documents and data mapping and Interaction with our internal customers.
